alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wayne (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 23 at 6:43PM MDT until June 23 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHEASTERN GARFIELD AND SOUTH CENTRAL WAYNE COUNTIES... At 643 PM MDT, the public reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Hanksville. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hanksville. This includes the following highways... Utah Route 276 between mile markers 0 and 3. Utah Route 95 between mile markers 0 and 30. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 113 and 118. This includes the following streams and drainages... Bull Creek in the town of Hanksville, Poison Springs, Conundrum Canyon and other area streams, dry washes and slot canyons. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
